subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Connecticut forward Curtis Kelly in transferring in hopes of earning more playing time. Kelly, a sophomore, has not decided where he will go, UConn said. Kelly, a 6-foot-9, 234-pound Bronx native, appeared in 51 games in two seasons with the Huskies. He averaged 2.4 points and 2.2 rebounds.
